name: ISO Platformer
description:
ISO Platformer

Use the arrow keys to move or WASD to move the car.

Collect coins and avoid the traffic cones!

Be careful not to fall off the edge though!

Hit the purple ball to move onto the next level! 

Drop your feedback in the comments below or hit me up on social media:
